statements: SELECT * FROM InfluencerPayment WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_name, payment_amount FROM InfluencerPayment WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerPayment WHERE payment_schedule BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT payment_amount, influencer_id, influencer_name FROM InfluencerPayment ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, payment_schedule FROM InfluencerPayment ORDER BY payment_schedule ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, payment_amount FROM InfluencerPayment WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerPayment WHERE influencer_id = 5;
SELECT MAX(payment_amount) AS max_payment FROM InfluencerPayment;
SELECT influencer_name, payment_schedule FROM InfluencerPayment WHERE payment_schedule > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_schedule ASC;
SELECT AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment, COUNT(*) AS total_payments FROM InfluencerPayment;
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE influencer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM payments GROUP BY influencer_id;
SELECT * FROM payment_schedules WHERE payment_frequency = 'monthly';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT influencer_id, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE influencer_id = 5 AND payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT influencer_id, payment_frequency FROM payment_schedules WHERE payment_frequency LIKE '%monthly%'
SELECT * FROM payments p INNER JOIN payment_schedules ps ON p.influencer_id = ps.influencer_id WHERE p.payment_amount > 500 AND ps.payment_frequency = 'monthly' ORDER BY p.payment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM influencer_payments
SELECT influencer_id, payment_amount FROM influencer_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM influencer_personal_info WHERE influencer_id = 1
SELECT influencer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM influencer_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT influencer_id, full_name, email, phone_number FROM influencer_personal_info
SELECT influencer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM influencer_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM influencer_personal_info WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT influencer_id, full_name, email, phone_number FROM influencer_personal_info WHERE influencer_id = 10;
SELECT influencer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM influencer_payments WHERE payment_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT i.influencer_id, i.full_name, p.payment_amount, p.payment_date FROM influencer_personal_info i JOIN influencer_payments p ON i.influencer_id = p.influencer_id;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_email FROM influencers WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, next_payment_date FROM influencers JOIN payment_schedules ON influencers.influencer_id = payment_schedules.influencer_id;
SELECT * FROM payment_logs WHERE payment_status = 'Successful';
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, payment_method FROM influencers WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT influencers.influencer_name, payment_logs.payment_date FROM influencers INNER JOIN payment_logs ON influencers.influencer_id = payment_logs.payment_id ORDER BY influencers.influencer_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT influencer_id, COUNT(payment_id) AS total_payments FROM payments GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING total_payments > 5;
SELECT * FROM influencer_payments;
SELECT influencer_id, payment_amount FROM influencer_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_email FROM influencer_details WHERE influencer_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT transaction_id, payment_id, transaction_amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT schedule_id, influencer_id, schedule_date, schedule_amount FROM influencer_schedules WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM influencer_payments JOIN influencer_schedules ON influencer_payments.influencer_id = influencer_schedules.influencer_id
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_email FROM influencer_details WHERE influencer_phone LIKE '%555%'
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM influencer_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT payment_method FROM payment_methods
